metadata.title: CVE-2021-4317 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 96.0.4664.93 allowed aremote attacker to perform arbitrary read/write via a crafted HTML page.(Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
